short_desc: LARPD is offering more than 35 select camps: Sports, Fun in the Sun, Art, Ballerina, Preschool Spanish, Science, Computer, Judo, Drawing, Drama, Cooking, Tumbling, Animation Jr. Adventure, Dance, Lego and sports camps.   For more information please call .....more
description: LARPD is offering more than 35 select camps: Sports, Fun in the Sun, Art, Ballerina, Preschool Spanish, Science, Computer, Judo, Drawing, Drama, Cooking, Tumbling, Animation Jr. Adventure, Dance, Lego and sports camps.   For more information please call 925-373-5700 or visit their website at www.larpd.dst.ca.us
